title: Radio 2’s Ultimate Beatles Quiz
text:
Radio 2 is celebrating the Fab Four, their enduring legacy, and the 50th anniversary of their classic ‘Abbey Road’ album, with a special four-day pop-up digital radio station.

Do you know your Taxman from your Nowhere Man? Your Hard Day’s Night from your Good Day Sunshine? It’s time to put your Beatles knowledge to the test…

Prove how much you know about the iconic band, from their origins, to the height of Beatlemania, to their solo careers, to their enduring legacy on popular music, by taking Radio 2’s Ultimate Beatles trivia quiz - 50 questions about the band who released the final album they recorded together 50 years ago.
description: How well do you know the Fab Four? Put your knowledge to the test!
